name: Number C1000: Numeronius
text:
5 Level 12 monsters
(This card is not treated as a "Numeron" card.)
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; destroy 1 other monster on the field. At the end of the Battle Phase: Destroy as many other monsters on the field as possible, then you can Special Summon 1 monster from your opponent's GY in Defense Position. If this card you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect and sent to your GY while it has material: You can Special Summon 1 "Number iC1000: Numeronius Numeronia" from your Extra Deck, and if you do, attach this card to it as material.
